definitions: A person who cultivates or rears plants, fish, etc.
A sociologist or anthropologist who emphasizes the importance of culture in determining individual behaviour and the way in which society functions.
An expert in or student of human culture; specifically a cultural anthropologist. Compare culturologist, cultural studies.
A person who advocates the interests of his or her own culture, especially to the exclusion or detriment of the interests of other cultures.
Involving or characterized by emphasis on the importance of culture in determining individual behaviour and the way in which society functions.

Characterized by advocacy of the interests of one's own culture, especially to the exclusion or detriment of the interests of other cultures; characterized by discrimination against people from other cultures.
